log: Fix package name and repo URL.
Actually fix package name and repo URL...
Use consistent references to github repos
Bump dependencies after changing naming convention to be consistent
Add `Unit` `Rule` for determining which `Unit` is provided
Update dependencies and add generic property for `PlayerAction`.
Update dependencies and add generic property for `PlayerAction`.
Pass the `Attack` instance to the `Defeated` `Rule` so it can be determined if a `Unit` in a `City` was a defender or not.
Replace usages of `Math.random` with a testable injected dependency.
Rework constructor to accept the target `City`.
Rework constructor to accept the target `ITransport`.
Rework constructor to accept the target `ITransport`.
Add `UnitImprovementRegistry` via constructor and use updated `DelayedAction` constructor.
Fix bug where `Unit`s would become active whilst still having `Fortified` applied.
Ensure local `RuleRegistry` is passed on to `City` constructor.
Update to latest `DelayedAction` version and add wake condition to `Busy`
Ensure `Unit` `visibility` is used to check when to wake after `Sleep`ing.
Add labelled `Busy` `Rule` (`Sleeping`) to indicate the action being performed.
Ensure `cargo` is correctly reset with required number of moves when `Unload`ing.
Ensure type safety when using `this` to refer to `ITransport`.
Add military wariness to `Republic` and `Democracy` governments.
Attempt to fix perpetual `CivilDisorder` and `Production` causing `Unit`s to become unsupported.
Fixed bug where `CivilDisorder` effects were active any time there was any `Unhappiness`.
Update to use new `Yield` mechanism. Actually, it was in part due to this module that the mechanism changed...
Fix a bug where `CivilDisorder` effects were applied even if the `City` wasn't in civil disorder.
Remove `CivilDisorder` `Yield` effects and move those to the respective `civ-`... modules.
Rewrite to use customised `Yield`s for each property.
Add requirements for a `Factory` to be built before a `PowerPlant` can be built.
Ensure only one type of `PowerPlant` can exist within a `City`.
Ensure `Palace` is destroyed when a `City` is captured.
Add some basic cleanup for when `City`s are destroyed.
Move `Corruption` generation to `civ1-city`, where it makes more sense to exist.
If `CityGrowthRegistry` is missing expected `CityGrowth`, create and register it automatically in `setUpCity`
Update `Capturing` `Rule` to include `capturingPlayer` as well as the previously owning `Player`.
Add `reassignWorkers` function to be called via UI.
Update `Captured` event to include both previous owner and capturing player.
Move `Captured` event to `Player` to handle `player:defeated` events.
Fix bug where `Unit`s weren't destroyed when their supporting `City` was destroyed.
Remove `Rule` that empties the `FoodStorage` on shrink.
Add `Unit` `Defeated` `Rule` to handle a `City` being destroyed instead of captured.
Slight tweak to how `Yield`s are weighted.
Update handling not adding `Production` when `City` is in `CivilDisorder`.
Update `CityBuild` and `ChangeProduction` instantiations with new `PlayerAction` changes.
Ensure when a `Unit` is defeated in a `City` that the population is only reduced when it's a defender.
Ensure `Irrigation` and `Road` `TileImprovement`s are only added if they don't already exist.
Update `setUpCity` to allow bypassing of `TileImprovement` additions.
Ensure `@civ-clone/core-city-happiness` is used as a package, not a github repo.
Track `destroyed` status rather than unregister the `City`.
Update registration mechanism to reduce duplication in other packages.
Use `Unit` `Rule` to control what `Unit`s are provided.
Add `index.ts` so that `Rule`s are registered and processed.
Fix method calls and expected returns.
Update usages of `Math.random` to be an injectable number provider.
Another attempt at the `City` type of `GoodyHut`.
Prevent unhandled exception on `Changed` `Rule` when `PlayerWorld`s have not yet been initialised.
Utilise `AvailableGovernmentsRegistry` and separate `Revolution` `PlayerAction` (although TODO, change that to the request and a random delay for the `ChooseGovernment` `MandatoryAction`).
Remove `Client` and `Player` creation from here, this should be handlded by the renderer.
Try to improve performance for scoring start tiles.
Fix bug where `Unit`s would become active whilst still having `Fortified` applied.
Move out the calculation of start tiles to a `Worker` to help prevent locking the main thread.
Add `player:defeated` events based on a `Player` having no more `City`s.
Add restrictions on the types of `Terrain`s that can be start squares.
Ensure `Tile` `Yield` cache is cleared each time visibility is changed.
Move event contents into `Rule`s where possible.
Remove reliance on other `civ1-*` packages, preferring individual packages instead.
Ensure local `RuleRegistry` is passed in to `World` `Built` `Rule`s when `Unit`s are created.
Refactor out `Worker`. This probably needs to be added back in at some point...
Simplify `World` built `Rule` by breaking out into `Spawn` and `PickStartTile` `Rule`s.
Ensure `destroyed` `Unit`s are excluded from being processed.
Fix bug that prevented `ChooseResearch` `PlayerAction` from being provided.
Updates to randomly start with some `Advance`s.
Acquire `Advance`s when capturing an advance enemey `City`.
Fix a bug where if there are no `Advance`s available to research (or fewer than the number of granted `Advance`s will be) it'll grant as many are available.
Update handling not adding `Research` when `City` is in `CivilDisorder`.
Ensure `@civ-clone/core-city-happiness` is used as a module, not a github repo.
Ensure `Corruption` can never exceed the available `Trade`.
Add `Player` `turn-start` `Rule` to convert `Trade` into the component `Yield`s.
Update handling not adding `Gold` when `City` is in `CivilDisorder`.
Handle running out of `Gold` in the treasury by selling the maintained `CityImprovement` that would deplete it.
Ensure `@civ-clone/core-city-happiness` is used as a package, not a github repo.
Update actions to pass in entities for `Disembark`, `Embark` and `CaptureCity`
Updates to `Action`s in-line with new `DelayedAction` version.
Fix `ClearX` and `PlantForest` actions and give `Ocean` `MovementCost` back to enable `Embark` again.
Fix bug where units could retry a failed move over and over.
Made it more likely that your `Move` would succeed (>50% of `Move`s means it'll work - in-line with Civ).
Update `ActiveUnit` and `InactiveUnit` instantiations with new `PlayerAction` changes.
Add missing `MovementCost`s and use named re-usable `Criterion`s for `Action` `Rule`s where possible.
Ensure all `Unit`s on a `Tile` are destroyed when the defending `Unit` is `Destroyed`, unless in a `City`.
Track `destroyed` status rather than unregister the `Unit`.
Update to work with new `setUpCity` form.
Add `Obsoletion` `Rule` to notify `Wonder` owners for obsolesence.
Move `Yield` `Rule`s to `Cost` `Rule`s to enable accurate processing.
Update to remove requirement for `Player` to be passed into the `Wonder` constructor.
Update distribution `Rule`s to use `Rule`s defined in `core-world-generator` instead of `core-terrain`.
Updating world generator values to generate maps closer to those from the original Civilization. More work still to do here.
Fix bug with incorrect `Yield`s for `Plains` with `Horse`.
Fix bug where `Irrigation` and `Mine` could both exist on the same `Tile`.
Add updated `Tile` yields for other governments.
Update calls to `Math.random` to be an injectable random number generator.
Ensure `Road` and `Railroad` are not applied multiple times.
Add support for `Earth` `Generator` and fixed start `Tile`s associated.
Add missing `instance` to `AIClientRegistry` and allow `LeaderRegistry` instance to be passed in.
Replace usages of `Math.random` with a testable injected dependency.
Make `CityBuild`s extend `DataObject`s for exposing data to `Client`s.
Add `ChangeProduction` `PlayerAction` when a `City` is already building something.
Fix path reference from relative to "absolute" via `@civ-clone`.
Update `CityBuild#available` mechanism to show resource costs for items.
Add `Buildable` class that `Unit`s and `CityImprovement`s inherit from.
Change logic to pave the way for alternative costs associated to `Buildable` items.
Update to use `PlayerAction` generics and fix return type of `Buildable`.
Re-work entities and interfaces to avoid having to forcibly cast everything.
Add `CityGrowth` object as an argument to `FoodExhasted` `Rule` instead of `City`.
Update to use new `Buildable` class from core-city-build.
Remove `Player` as a constructor argument since this is available (and more likely reliable) via `City` instead.
Track `destroyed` status rather than unregister the `CityImprovement`.
Add `player` to data transfer information and add `city` `AdditionalData` to `Tile`s.
Add missing fields to be exported via `DataObject#toPlainObject`.
Update `Captured` `Rule` so that the previous owner and the capturing owner are explicitly provided.
Allow `YieldRegistry` to be supplied on construct or runtime (`.yields`).
Update `yields` to process `Yield` then `Cost` `Rule`s, fixing some bugs.
Rework `Yield` `Rule`s to return `Yield`s rather than expecting `Yield` constructors to be provided.
Track `destroyed` status rather than unregister the `City`.
Update to use injectable random number generator instead of hard-coded `Math.random`.
Add `id` to `DataObject`s to allow easy referencing from within `Client`s.
Allow `AdditionalData` to be applied to child classes.
Change `DataObject`s to allow recursive data to be stored.
Include `reconstitueData` as a core lib to be used in other packages.
Add `Entity` and `EntityInstance` types for use in other packages.
Remove `ulid` and replace with simpler ID generation.
Remove `ulid` and replace with simpler ID generation.
Add `toPlainObject` filter to allow masking of unknown objects (enemy `Player`s, `Unit`s etc.)
Perform `filter`ing on all objects, rather than only `DataObject`s. This also means we can return something other than a `DataObject`.
Add `sourceClass()` method to auto cast to `IConstructor`.
Ensure `id` is included in `IDataObject` so that `keys` for both `DataObject` and `IDataObject` return the same thing.
Add `@types/glob` as a direct dependency for dependent packages.
Prevent `Start` `Rule`s from being processed directly. Might rever this later...
Remove reliance on `node` so that a browser can be used instead.
Add `Distribution` `Rule` for controlling placement of huts within `World`s.
Remove `Revolution`. Move to its own package.
Add `VisibilityChanged` `Rule`, triggered when new `Tile`s are registered.
Refactor `PlayerWorld` to store `PlayerTile`s to allow the world changes to be hidden from players (like in the original game).
Update to use more appropriately named iterator type from `core-registry`.
Allow defined properties to remain `configurable` when (for example) a `City` is built on an already known `Tile`.
Make `PlayerAction`s generic to make using `PlayerAction.value()` easier.
Add `Spawn` `Rule` to control what happens when a `Player` is spawned into the game.
Improve TypeScript bindings on `Registry.getBy` to hint at properties to search for.
Add `Ruleset`s to enable/disable sets of `Rule`s, this will be useful when these can be managed via a UI.
Allow `RuleRegistry` cache to be cleared externally.
Using generics in a better way to provide better hints to arguments for `RuleRegistry.process`.
Ensure `Advance` extends `DataObject` and type issue in `PlayerResearch`.
Add a caching layer for `TerrainFeatureRegistry.getByTerrain`. This sped up the map generation and start `Tile` sorting by a considerable amount.
Add convenience method `PlayerTradeRates#setAll` to offload the `balance` functionality to the frontend.
Ensure an empty `Yield` is passed in to the `Cost` `Rule`s in `PlayerTreasury`.
Amend `Turn` to no longer inherit from `Yield`.
Ensure instances are able to be passed in for events and `Rule`s.
Ensure return types match for TypeScript compiler.
Update `Transport` to include a mixin mechanism for extending existing classes, reducing repetition for `Transport` `Unit`s of different types.
Ensure `Base` is `typeof Unit` so that it includes the static methods required by `IBuildable`.
Update `DelayedAction` to have `Turn` passed into the constructor.
Fix bug where `Unit`s would become active whilst still having `Fortified` applied.
Update to add `status` property to capture the current action being performed (if any) and add in `player` and `visibility` keys for data transfer.
Updates to call `Created` `Rule`s after setting the keys.
Update to use new `Buildable` class from core-city-build.
Ensure `Moved` `Rule`s are triggered at the end of the `DelayedAction` too.
Allow custom `Busy` `Rule`s to be supplied to `DelayedAction`s.
Include the `Action` in `Defeated` `Rule`s so when a `Unit` in a `City` is `Destroyed` it's easy enough to work out if it was a defender.
Track `destroyed` status rather than unregister the `Unit`.
Add event to trigger when `Wonder`s are obsoleted.
Add utilities to help when map data is used elsewhere.
Add `PickGenerator` (to choose the `Generator` to build the `World` map) and `PickStartTile` (to choose the starting `Tile`s for the `Player`) `Rule`s.
Ensure `undefined` is never added to a `Yield`.
Fix caching issue when `Yield`s get modified after caching.
Fix a bug when `Tile` `Yield`s exist for which weights are not provided.
Convert `World` from a `Registry` to a `DataObject` to allow `height` and `width` to be passed to the `Client`.
Have `World#build` return `Promise<World>` to help with tests in other packages.
Fix bug where all `Tile`s were rated as `0` since the changes to `Yield`s.
Update to use more appropriately named iterator type from `core-registry`.
Ensure `RuleRegistry` is passed into `World`s constructor, instead of when used by `build`.
Remove `YieldValue` value object, the high usage combined with `ulid` from `DataObject` was causing slowdowns and didn't need to be a `DataObject` at all.
Add `NegativeYield` as a convenience object for costs.
Prevent infinite loop and output debug info.
Updates to prevent TypeScript being sad about the `catch (e)`, `reject(e)` flow.
Add methods for catching when `City`s or `Unit`s are captured or defeated.
Fix `SimpleAIClient` to use the new `CityBuild` mechanism.
Add hard-coded check for `Earth` map to ensure first `City` is built in the right place.
